text: 12+ Months Contract (With a possibility of getting permanent)

strong: BIG NO TO C2C (Please do not apply)
=E2=80=A2 Industrial Software Engineering Experience =E2=80=93 CI/CD, Unit Testing, Working on projects with multiple team members.

p.15: =E2=80=A2 Ability to write robust code in one or more of Python, Java and Scala
p.16: =E2=80=A2 Familiarity with machine learning frameworks (like Keras or PyTorch) and libraries (like scikit-learn)
p.17: =E2=80=A2 Experience using Amazon Web Services (EC2, S3 etc) with data at scale
p.18: =E2=80=A2 Proficient in core technologies like Spark, Hadoop and Hive.
p.20: =E2=80=A2 Ability to work in a team
p.21: =E2=80=A2 Design, develop, debug, and modify components of machine learning and deep learning systems and applications,
p.23: =E2=80=A2 Develop and tune model training and inference systems.
p.24: =E2=80=A2 Complete documentation and procedures for installation and maintenance.
p.25: =E2=80=A2 Actively participate in group technology reviews to critique work of self and others.
p.26: =E2=80=A2 Work collaboratively with all members of technical staff. Collaborate with data scientists, program managers, and product managers in the development of assigned components.
p.27: =E2=80=A2 Participate in and provide input to requirements definition.
p.28: =E2=80=A2 Run machine learning tests and experiments
p.30: =E2=80=A2 Study and transform data science prototypes
p.31: =E2=80=A2 Research and implement appropriate ML algorithms and tools
p.32: =E2=80=A2 Select appropriate datasets and data representation methods
p.33: =E2=80=A2 Train and retrain systems when necessary
p.34: =E2=80=A2 Extend existing ML libraries and frameworks Qualifications
p.35: =E2=80=A2 Proven experience as a Machine Learning Engineer or similar role: 4-5 years of experience in software
p.37: =E2=80=A2 Understanding of data structures, data modeling and software architecture
p.38: =E2=80=A2 Knowledge of math, probability, statistics and algorithms
p.39: =E2=80=A2 Knowledge of streaming platforms like Kafka and Kinesis.
p.40: =E2=80=A2 Basic knowledge of various ML model platforms.
p.41: =E2=80=A2 Experience standing up model inferencing API endpoints.
p.42: =E2=80=A2 Exposure to No SQL databases like MongoDB.
p.43: =E2=80=A2 Experienced in using SQL for querying data from relational tables.
p.44: =E2=80=A2 Excellent analytical and problem solving skills with an aptitude for troubleshooting issues.
p.45: =E2=80=A2 Degree with strong technical focus (Computer Science, Engineering).
